# Attributes overview

- [Accessing Attributes by Using Reflection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/accessing-attributes-by-using-reflection.md): Learn more about: Accessing Attributes by Using Reflection (Visual Basic)
- [AttributeUsage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/attributeusage.md): Learn more about: AttributeUsage (Visual Basic)
- [Common Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/common-attributes.md): Learn more about: Common Attributes (Visual Basic)
- [Creating Custom Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/creating-custom-attributes.md): Learn more about: Creating Custom Attributes (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Create a C-C++ Union by Using Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/how-to-create-a-c-cpp-union-by-using-attributes.md): Learn more about: How to: Create a C/C++ Union by Using Attributes (Visual Basic)
- [Attributes overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/attributes/index.md): Learn more about: Attributes overview (Visual Basic)
